extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">www.digitalpreservation.gov/formats/fdd/</field><field name="documentation">http://www.midi.org/techspecs/midispec.php, http://www.midi.org/techspecs/index.php, http://www.blitter.com/~russtopia/MIDI/~jglatt/tech/midispec.htm</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Bitstream encoding format for MIDI "messages" that, in the words of the standards document, "can be thought of as instructions which tell a music synthesizer how to play a piece of music."
name: Musical Instrument Digital Interface (MIDI) Sequence Data
